body.p: Message Invalid character found in the request target [/ebisearch/ws/rest/biosamples?query="Acanthamoeba%20spp"%20OR%20"Babesia%20divergens"%20OR%20"Babesia%20microti"%20OR%20"Babesia%20spp"%20OR%20"Balantioides%20coli"%20OR%20"Blastocystis%20hominis"%20OR%20"Cryptosporidium%20hominis"%20OR%20"Cryptosporidium%20parvum"%20OR%20"Cryptosporidium%20spp"%20OR%20"Cyclospora%20cayetanensis"%20OR%20"Cyclospora%20spp"%20OR%20"Cystoisospora%20belli"%20OR%20"Dientamoeba%20fragilis"%20OR%20"Encephalitozoon%20cuniculi"%20OR%20"Encephalitozoon%20hellem"%20OR%20"Encephalitozoon%20intestinalis"%20OR%20"Entamoeba%20histolytica"%20OR%20"Enterocytozoon%20bieneusi"%20OR%20"Giardia%20intestinalis"%20OR%20"Leishmania%20aethiopica"%20OR%20"Leishmania%20braziliensis"%20OR%20"Leishmania%20donovani"%20OR%20"Leishmania%20major"%20OR%20"Leishmania%20mexicana"%20OR%20"Leishmania%20peruviana"%20OR%20"Leishmania%20spp"%20OR%20"Leishmania%20tropica"%20OR%20"Naegleria%20fowleri"%20OR%20"Plasmodium%20falciparum"%20OR%20"Plasmodium%20spp"%20OR%20"Sarcocystis%20suihominis"%20OR%20"Toxoplasma%20gondii"%20OR%20"Trichomonas%20vaginalis"%20OR%20"Trypanosoma%20brucei%20brucei"%20OR%20"Trypanosoma%20brucei%20gambiense"%20OR%20"Trypanosoma%20brucei%20rhodesiense"%20OR%20"Trypanosoma%20cruzi"&fields=id,name,collection_date ]. The valid characters are defined in RFC 7230 and RFC 3986

Description The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).
